tool_description: Vehicle Route Planning , Delivery Plan , VRP ,Vehicle Dispatch , Route plan ,Route Optimization, Dispatch , Delivery management
name: Matrix Route Planner
title: Matrix Route Planner

api_list.name: Route Planning
api_list.description: This API is used to optimize route plans for vehicles in delivery process. This API gets Vehicles and their capacities and Destination locations as input and calculates an optimal plan for each vehicle as well as time of arraivals.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://matrix-route-planner.p.rapidapi.com/crp/routeplan/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "matrix-route-planner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
